title: reconnect after the game
body: When I finished the game it was on "skip waiting fr status" then I closed my League client and reopened it then it said reconnect, I pressed it, then it went to the game screen and went black, it said that it was unable to reconnect. This Sucks... I cant play any game..... WHYYYYYY RIOT{{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

replies.body:
same ive got that shit right now
wtf is this
will i be banned/ low piority once the maintenance Finsh
No, any losses will be replaced with Loss Prevented. No penalty.
how long will this maintenance take

Network maintenance, wait it out. :)

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/b4NjPP3c-network-maintenance-22042015
